item.title: Playing With Tokudb
item.author: roman.heinrich@gmail.com
item.description: I’ve decided to take a look at Tokudb and see, how easy it is to use and administer. Since it’s much better to have your stuff being repeatable and easily shareable, we’re gonna use Puppet and Vagrant for this. The layout is based on my article The Perfect Puppet Setup For Vagrant-article. https://github.com/mindreframer/vagrant-tokudb-puppet/ Let’s dive deeper into a slightly more complext module for Puppet: class tokudb{ class{"tokudb::params": } - class{"
